title: This beautifully updated ranch!
posting_body: This beautifully updated ranch is located in the heart of Melvindale, minutes from The Hill and major expressways.
This house features central air, a tiled bathroom, quartz countertops, custom cabinetry, and built-in appliances including a washer and drier.
There is off street parking with a partially fenced in back yard enclosing a shed for additional storage.
Owner responsible for yard maintenance and all utilities.
First months rent along with security deposit due at time of move in.
